name: Jump Paths
description:
Jump you're cube down the paths.
Collect gems to score.
Some paths have more gems, and some have more spikes.
Hit the arrow to change path.
Jump the arrow to continue on the same path.
Avoid the spikes and jump you're way to the top of the leaderboard.
Use gems to unlock new Cubes.
Some Cubes are better than others!
One tap game play.
Quick paced jumping.
Quick reactions needed.
Choose the right path for maximum Gems.
Share and compete with your friends.
